strapiPost.title: LIVE! at Turnbow Concert Series Continues This Thursday
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by the Downtown Springdale Alliance
strapiPost.content:
LIVE! at Turnbow is back again this Thursday, May 26, and two great acts are lined up for the evening.

  • Performers: The opening musical act will be Tony Redman, one of the top performers in today’s blues scene and a guitar player with an expressive vocal style and a high-energy live set. The headliner is The Jeff Horton Band, a six-piece American Blues Band that fuses “hard-hitting grooves and guitar licks that singe.”
  • Evening of music, food & drink: LIVE! at Turnbow is a free concert series at Walter Turnbow Park where the community can listen to live, outdoor music while enjoying a bite to eat or drink in the Downtown Outdoor Dining District.  Music starts at 6:30p, and in the event of inclement weather, concerts will be rescheduled to the following Sunday. Check this Facebook page for updates.

Learn more HERE.
